name: KinectLife
tagline: KinectImagination. KinectFriends. KinectAdventure. Let your imaginations guide you.
body:
###Launch KinectLife Online* 
***
###About KinectLife
With KinectLife, you can travel to the Virtual World with one mobile device. Connect and meet up with your friends there! KinectLife will always support you lives out in the fantasized world KinectLife provides for free. Create an account today to enter everything you've ever imagined. Created by a kid who always daydreamed about his world and your world!
***
©️2016 Tomoyoshi Yamamoto. VR360 system all creted by Tomoyoshi Yamamoto. For Aichi the brave tester.
